sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Link, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {useState} from 'react' import axios from "axios" const Register = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ name: "", surname: "", email: "", password: "", }); const [err, setError] = useState(null); const handleChange = (e) => { setInputs((prev) => ({ ...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await axios.post("/auth/register", inputs); navigate("/login"); } catch (err) { setError(err.response.data); } }; return (

Dashboard

Information

{/* */}

Add employee: read the guide

First time here ? Put a glance on The User Guide of the Fortunato Portal

Add Employee to Database

Name

Surname

Birthdate

Email

Password

Laboratory

Status

Contract

University

) } export default Register
